title: Gamification-Based Short-Intensive Course in Web Design and Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Basic HTML/CSS comprehension and programming experience (e.g., Python)
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction-focused education utilizing game elements in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement responsive web layouts in a gamification environment.
Learners can develop JavaScript-based interactive elements through mini-game-style assignments.
Learners can receive a three-tiered diagnosis (beginner/intermediate/advanced) of their individual learning progress and skill proficiency via a formative assessment system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
